Text.Value: ... you were so close. So close to walking out of this alive.

EditorData.NodeContext: Air of finality, but she says it as if it's a shame.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Close-up of Olly lying on the floor - already tortured to death,
EditorData.NodeContext: Olly is bound to a chair on the floor, tortued to death

Text.Value: *You see nothing you can use. The mercenaries shift impatiently.*
Hah! Of course - all you had to do was ask.

EditorData.NodeContext: Genuinely amused - she likes your directness, and is all to happy to grant your request.

Text.Value: Look around for something you can use.
Show some respect, Rugan. The boy was loyal to you 'til the end.

EditorData.NodeContext: As if disappointed in her former mentor - just wants this business over with.

Text.Value: Weapons!

EditorData.NodeContext: Barked order to the men behind her to take up their weapons.

Text.Value: 'Steel ends enemies, but gold makes friends.'
NonoNONONO PLEASE-

EditorData.AnimationTags: Note to animator : Punching, kick on the face, whatever is good to kill Rugan but no weapons.
EditorData.NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Begging right up until the moment you kill him (dies at end of node, either stabbed or shot)

Text.Value: ... you bloody wouldn't! Hah. You've got guts. I respect that.

EditorData.NodeContext: A long pause while she sizes you up - you've just threatened to trigger explosives and kill everyone present, yourself included. She's impressed, and it's a threat she can't ignore.

Text.Value: There's not much money in retribution, true...

EditorData.NodeContext: Considering - you've made a fair argument and she's leaning towards being merciful.

Text.Value: I'm going to walk out of here alive. Play it right, and so will you.
All right then, recruit - you can stock up here and be on your way. Bring the cargo to Baldur's Gate. Someone there will make contact.

EditorData.NodeContext: Taking on her military tone - she's your superior and she's giving you orders.

Text.Value: Profit's more important than vengeance. Let's make a deal.
Oof. I got a tingle for a second there.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.
EditorData.NodeContext: Amused - player was  trying to sound fearsome, but it ultimately fell flat.

Text.Value: You've read Manshoon. Seems you know our ways better than poor Rugan here.

EditorData.NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

Text.Value: You're the one who taught me rule number one, remember?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A shot of the torturer from behind, the moving aside to reveal Rugan.
EditorData.NodeContext: As if reflecting on 'good old days', but with a harder edge

Text.Value: The cargo's been opened. Not a problem, I hope?
I've already shown I've got more wits than Rugan. Let's work together.
You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.

EditorData.NodeContext: All joviality dropped - flat and icy-cold.

Text.Value: Tell you what: you've already taken Rugan's cargo, so finish the job and I'll let you live. Deliver it to Baldur's Gate.

EditorData.NodeContext: She's calculating - she was ready to kill you, but you've proven that you might actually be the person to finish an all important job for her.

Text.Value: Profit's more important than vengeance. Let's make a deal.
Wait! WAIT! It was Olly, I SWEAR IT WAS OLLY!

EditorData.AnimationTags: Murat - [Re-use] the player is approching Ruggan, weapon in hand to kill him.
EditorData.NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Hysterical, panicking - he knows he's about to die but is begging nonetheless.

Text.Value: You're the one who recruited me, Rugan.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: For this entire exchange, Zarys is standing about ten feet above us on a raised platform.
EditorData.NodeContext: She's overseeing the torture of an agent of hers - one who originally recruited her to the organisation. Tone is chiding and also vaguely disgusted - he should have known better.

Text.Value: *You spot explosives placed around the cavern. The Zhent are ready to bring the place down.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.

Text.Value: Bwaah.

EditorData.NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Any moan / gurgle of pain or fear. He's been tortured for quite some time and is too exhausted to scream

Text.Value: Well, at least you've read Manshoon. Makes your 'emissary' lie a touch more tasteful.
Oh, and kill him.

EditorData.NodeContext: Off-hand, as if asking you to kill an unarmed man she's known for years is a mere formality.

Text.Value: THINK YOU CAN BEST ME?
Dead of boredom listening to you, pipsqueak.
No matter who you are.

EditorData.NodeContext: Turning to us, making it clear the threat is intended for us also.

Text.Value: Which you should've known. That is, if you'd done your research before impersonating one of us.
Can we just skip to the killing?
*You recall an old Zhentarim proverb coined by their founder.*
Those explosives are sensitive - be a shame if something set them off.
Small problem - I don't actually have the cargo.
I'm going to walk out of here alive. Play it right, and so will you.
No final plea? Good - reckon I've heard enough of those today.

EditorData.NodeContext: As if vaguely surprised that you're not begging - but grimly pleased. She's run out of patience.

Text.Value: I won't do that.
And just like that, everyone profits.

EditorData.NodeContext: Breezy, as if some simple matter has now been settled.

Text.Value: No. Olly didn't remember either, did you Olly?

EditorData.NodeContext: Temporarily switching focus to a figure bound beside the tortured agent - he's the new recruit -  already dead from his wounds. but she's talking to him almost cheerfully.

Text.Value: I've already shown I've got more wits than Rugan. Let's work together.
Hah! The silver tongue on you. Usually I'd rip it out, but... well, these aren't normal times.

EditorData.NodeContext: Genuinely amused - you're trying to talk your way out of an impossible situation, and she respects that.

Text.Value: You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.

EditorData.NodeContext: All joviality dropped - flat and icy-cold.

Text.Value: Gladly.
Obey - kill Rugan.
Hah - the fire in you! Maybe we wouldn't be here if Rugan had a little of that, eh?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.
EditorData.NodeContext: Genuine laughter - you're threatening her gang despite the odds being heavily stacked against you. She's won over by it.

Synopsis:
We walk in to find Zarys overseeing the torture of an agent that handed over special cargo to us. The agent is currently bound to a chair and badly beaten, and we're due to get the same treatment in her eyes - unless we can talk her out of it.

Volume is likely louder than normal conversation but not shouting - she's standing on a raised platform perhaps ten feet above us and the tortured agent,
